content: That sounds amazing! I've been really into craft cocktails lately, and I've been experimenting with different recipes at home. I just got back from a mixology class at a local bar where I learned how to make a proper Old Fashioned, which is now my go-to drink. I've been practicing making it at home and I think I've finally got the hang of it. Do you have any other Japanese whiskey-based cocktail recipes you could recommend?
